import { send } from "process"; import classes from "./ContactUs.module.css"; import office from "./office.jpg"; import { MdLocationOn, MdCall, MdEmail } from "react-icons/md"; import {useEffect, useState, useRef} from 'react'; const ContactUs = (props ) => { const isMounted = useRef(false); useEffect(() => { isMounted.current = true; props.passMountInfo(true); return () => { isMounted.current = false props.passMountInfo(false); } }, [props]); return (
